This is an interesting topic for debate.
 
 http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/20267175/
 
 I'm not sure how to comment on this. This judge is so wrong on so many issues I don't even know where to begin. But this is an interesting article. But it does go to show why the need to educate and de-demonize homosexuals is important.
 
 I know many gays who are pretty damned good at sports! There have been many gay olympians.... gay football players, basketball players... etc. But the judges comments kind of reminded me a bit for the proponents for DADT.
 
 :xbanghead
